title: Now that funneling strat has disappeared can yi get his bonus damage on minions back?
body: I used to see some ppl playing him on top por even in midlane, but after that nerf because of the funneling strat, i never seen it again. Now that is no longer viable, can you revert It? U nerfed It because of that, now that ISN'T here It makes no sense to NOT revert It
